chrome.pageAction

Top-Level Variables
pageAction: ChromePageAction
Classes
ChromePageAction

Use the chrome.pageAction API to put icons inside the address bar. Page actions represent actions that can be taken on the current page, but that aren't applicable to all pages.

Top-Level Variables

static final ChromePageAction pageAction

Accessor for the chrome.pageAction namespace.

Class ChromePageAction

Fields
onClicked: Stream
Getters and Setters
onClicked: Stream<dynamic>
Methods
getPopup(Map<dynamic, dynamic> details): Future<String>
getTitle(Map<dynamic, dynamic> details): Future<String>
hide(int tabId): void
setIcon(Map<dynamic, dynamic> details): Future<dynamic>
setPopup(Map<dynamic, dynamic> details): void
setTitle(Map<dynamic, dynamic> details): void
show(int tabId): void

Fields

final Stream onClicked

Getters and Setters

Stream<dynamic> get onClicked

Fired when a page action icon is clicked. This event will not fire if the page action has a popup.

Methods

Future<String> getPopup(Map<dynamic, dynamic> details)

Gets the html document set as the popup for this page action.

Future<String> getTitle(Map<dynamic, dynamic> details)

Gets the title of the page action.

void hide(int tabId)

Hides the page action.

tabId The id of the tab for which you want to modify the page action.

Future<dynamic> setIcon(Map<dynamic, dynamic> details)

Sets the icon for the page action. The icon can be specified either as the path to an image file or as the pixel data from a canvas element, or as dictionary of either one of those. Either the <b>path</b> or the <b>imageData</b> property must be specified.

void setPopup(Map<dynamic, dynamic> details)

Sets the html document to be opened as a popup when the user clicks on the page action's icon.

void setTitle(Map<dynamic, dynamic> details)

Sets the title of the page action. This is displayed in a tooltip over the page action.

void show(int tabId)

Shows the page action. The page action is shown whenever the tab is selected.

tabId The id of the tab for which you want to modify the page action.
